Two users chose different RSA keys but unknowingly shared a prime. Intercepted message: 280174636407729011210131622865160242276403877951195938310978987437379162324453733606142184414049655518375071906335054528014158540523159629714163802131888554069427882178779126402678660555496722756820387682282272496955839566714471765. Can you recover the original plaintext?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=727146861637441370038039024504530176308624758269573761942058744304676132614293692116907008460903025627345202700439680727630810908040031804678765142683472588044246855467273847291702178411981946757780481768664760891412908827621045861, n2=713140852290358628871422518089076742475639925536396897112474808786623961290718667526641077825166713790364729221715796967145174922518436564998622455267187639436985845147542089631419719813218793755329363333251000540540120954611154041, e=575234469247619759801400758169249237325583496132369960194966103676079904159875116832991064421333092889222188856628280720547044988461653572434762243172272426321581496579254961598830231723726391236012909837369346720256406526190283511

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{g1vgcjql}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 280174636407729011210131622865160242276403877951195938310978987437379162324453733606142184414049655518375071906335054528014158540523159629714163802131888554069427882178779126402678660555496722756820387682282272496955839566714471765
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=727146861637441370038039024504530176308624758269573761942058744304676132614293692116907008460903025627345202700439680727630810908040031804678765142683472588044246855467273847291702178411981946757780481768664760891412908827621045861, n2=713140852290358628871422518089076742475639925536396897112474808786623961290718667526641077825166713790364729221715796967145174922518436564998622455267187639436985845147542089631419719813218793755329363333251000540540120954611154041, e=575234469247619759801400758169249237325583496132369960194966103676079904159875116832991064421333092889222188856628280720547044988461653572434762243172272426321581496579254961598830231723726391236012909837369346720256406526190283511
